name: Aliens versus Robots
description:
Take control of your own Ludus in this alternate reality. Train aliens and send them to the arena to fight for their lives. Become indebted in a time of need and rise as your gladiators win a crucial fight. This game will bring you up and down.

Developers notes: This is only the second game I have done, and as such I don't feel comfortable naming a price. This version has been tested and updated.
